content.rendered:
Worldwide expertise for specialist insurance markets

Our global team of loss adjusters is recognised as industry leaders by insurance and reinsurance markets worldwide. Any claim assigned to AqualisBraemar will be evaluated in terms of its technical challenges, specific engineering discipline(s), insurance conditions, geography, language and cultural nuances. A dedicated team of independent experts will be specifically assigned to ensure we meet and exceed our clients’ expectations.

Energy

Our loss adjusters are industry leaders in the adjustment of Upstream, Midstream and Downstream Oil & Gas insurance claims.

With engineers in all disciplines located globally, our adjusting expertise extends across the Energy, Power and alternative power sectorsin both the onshore and offshore environments.

Our claim experience includes:

  • Construction or builders all risk
  • Delay in start-up
  • Physical damage to property, plant & equipment
  • Business interruption
  • Control of well and operators’ extra expense
  • Environmental pollution
  • Third-party liability

Marine

We specialise in the adjustment of marine insurance claims in the offshore energy sector.

With our network of Marine Surveyor offices globally, together with our experience in the Offshore Energy sector, our services extend to cover all marine activities under this insurance class, including seismic, geotechnical, drilling (jack-up, semi-submersible, drill ship and tender assist), well servicing & subsea operations, diving, AUV & ROV, floating production & storage, cable & pipe laying, Heavy Lift, tugs, anchor handling & supply boats.

Our claim experience includes:

  • Hull and Machinery
  • Cargo Liabilities
  • Environmental Pollution
  • Loss of hire

Mining & Heavy Industries

AqualisBraemar provides experienced Adjusters for all aspects of mineral, precious gem and hydro-carbon mining, from mine construction to extraction, whether it utilises surface, underground, high wall and in-situ leaching techniques, extending to raw material processing.

Our expertise extends to other heavy industries including construction and operation of aluminium smelters; artillery production; desalination plants; industrial plants; fertilizer plants, shipyards and steel production.

Our claim experience includes:

  • Physical damage to plant & equipment
  • Boiler & machinery
  • Fire & explosion
  • Mine flood/collapse
  • Environmental pollution
  • Third-party liability
  • Product guarantee
  • Business interruption

Pollution & Liability

We specialise in the investigation and adjustment of claims related to both Onshore & Offshore Environmental Impairment, whether it be in the Oil & Gas, alternative Power (Geothermal), Marine or Industrial sector.

Our considerable experience includes large and small releases of various pollutants, from crude through condensate, to bitumen and diluted bitumen; in a myriad of environments, offshore and onshore, inclusive of salt and fresh water – equatorial through arctic, riparian and littoral, on land from populated and industrial areas through muskeg, forested and farmland.

Our adjusters can call upon their various engineering expertise and experience with failed infrastructure to gain an understanding of the Assured and/or regulators investigations.

Power & Utilities

Our adjusters are experienced in the adjustment of claims associated with Thermal, Nuclear, Hydro generation facilities, water treatment and desalination plants and the associated distribution and infrastructure networks.

With engineers in all disciplines located globally, our adjusting expertise extends across these sectors in both the onshore and offshore environments.

Our claim experience includes:

  • Construction or builders all risk
  • Delay in start-up
  • Physical damage to property, plant & equipment
  • Business interruption
  • Control of well and operators’ extra expense
  • Environmental pollution
  • Third-party liability

Renewables

We service all aspects of the renewable/alternative energy market, with expertise in wind, solar, geothermal, tidal/wave and biomass power generation, in both an onshore or offshore environment.

Our claim experience includes:

  • Construction or builders all risk
  • Delay in start-up
  • Physical damage to property, plant & equipment
  • Control of well and operators’ extra expense
  • Environmental pollution
  • Third-party liability
